item.title: NEM
item.description: score:16 Chances: Newmont Corporation has settled the previously announced offers to exchange for any and all of the 3.250% Notes due 2030. Nvidia and Apple stocks have demonstrated robust returns within a short time period, showcasing the potential for blue-chip stocks to perform well.
